title: How to Tie Hira Obi for Yukata

steps.title: Take about 16" or an arm's length from one Obi end and fold it in half (vertically).
steps.content: Take about 16" or an arm's length from one Obi end and fold it in half (vertically). Hold this end on your left. Hold the other side on your right. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Place the Obi over your shoulder.
steps.content: Place the Obi over your shoulder. Then, while holding left end, wrap the Obi around the waist 2 times.

steps.title: Fold the right end to make a triangle shape.
steps.content: Fold the right end to make a triangle shape. It should be narrower towards left.

steps.title: Make sure to tie so that the Left side is on top.
steps.content: Make sure to tie so that the Left side is on top.

steps.title: Bring Left to the upper center and bring vertical line.
steps.content: Bring Left to the upper center and bring vertical line.

steps.title: Unfold the Right side of the Obi so that its full width is exposed.
steps.content: Unfold the Right side of the Obi so that its full width is exposed.

steps.title: Fold in the rest.
steps.content: Fold in the rest. [2] X Research source

steps.title: Slide the Left underneath the Right in the center.
steps.content: Slide the Left underneath the Right in the center.

steps.title: This should be done in a clockwise direction while exhaling.
steps.content: This should be done in a clockwise direction while exhaling. [3] X Research source
